snippet: Drugs and drama, world records, an eccentric opening, historic breakthroughs, women boxers, a man with no legs. Quite an Olympics. What thrilled you? Made you weepy? What was rubbish? Let us know.
abstract: Drugs and drama, world records, an eccentric opening, historic breakthroughs, women boxers, a man with no legs. Quite an Olympics. What thrilled you? Made you weepy? What was rubbish? Let us know.

headline.main: London 2012: A Gold Medal, or An Also-Ran?
